Wasmer.io | Senior Software Engineers, Product Managers, Community Experts and more! | San Francisco, US or Remote | Full time

We are working on an Open Source platform that will enable the next generation of Cloud Computing using WebAssembly. Our stack is mainly written in Rust. If you have experience with AOT compilers, LLVM or any other IR we are looking for you! Also, if you like creating OSS communities and leading them... this is the perfect fit!

Interested? Shoot me an email and let's chat: syrus@wasmer.io
